00033 template <typename TYPE>
00034 class SimpleListElement
00035 {
00036     friend class SimpleList<TYPE>;
00037     friend class SimpleRecycleList<TYPE>;
00038
00039 public:
00041     SimpleListElement()
00042     {
00043         NextElement = NULL;
00044     }
00045
00047     void Init()
00048     {
00049           NextElement = NULL;
00050     }
00051
00053     virtual ~SimpleListElement();
00054
00055 private:
00056     TYPE ElementContainer;
00057      SimpleListElement<TYPE> * NextElement;
00058 };

00195 template <typename TYPE>
00196 SimpleList<TYPE>::SimpleList()
00197 {
00198     // There is nothing in the list
00199     NumberOfElements = 0;
00200     Head = NULL;
00201     Tail = NULL;
00202
00203     // There is no position at all
00204     PreviousElement = NULL;
00205     CurrentElement = NULL;
00206     RemoveCurrentHasOccured = false;
00207 }

00215 // Access fonction
00216 template <typename TYPE>
00217 bool SimpleList<TYPE>::Add( const TYPE& Val )
00218 {
00219     SimpleListElement<TYPE> * tmp = GetNewSimpleListElement();
00220     if ( tmp == NULL ) // Plus assez de memoire
00221         return false;
00222
00223     tmp->ElementContainer = Val;
00224     if ( Head == NULL ) // La liste etait vide
00225     {
00226         Tail =  Head = tmp;
00227     }
00228     else
00229     {
00230         // Le nouveau devient le dernier
00231         Tail->NextElement = tmp;
00232         Tail = tmp;
00233
00234         //if ( Head->NextElement == NULL )
00235         //{
00236         //      Head->NextElement = tmp;
00237         //}
00238     }
00239
00240     // On incremente le nombre d'objet dans la liste
00241     NumberOfElements++;
00242
00243     // Tout est ok
00244     return true;
00245 }
00246
00251 template <typename TYPE>
00252 bool SimpleList<TYPE>::AddHead( const TYPE& Val )
00253 {
00254     SimpleListElement<TYPE> * tmp = GetNewSimpleListElement();
00255     if ( tmp == NULL ) // Plus assez de memoire
00256         return false;
00257
00258     tmp->ElementContainer = Val;
00259     if ( Head == NULL ) // La liste etait vide
00260     {
00261         Tail =  Head = tmp;
00262     }
00263     else
00264     {
00265         // Le nouveau devient le dernier
00266         // Head->NextElement = tmp;
00267         tmp->NextElement = Head;
00268         Head = tmp;
00269     }
00270
00271     // On incremente le nombre d'objet dans la liste
00272     NumberOfElements++;
00273
00274     // Tout est ok
00275     return true;
00276 }

00282 template <typename TYPE>
00283 bool SimpleList<TYPE>::AddTail( const TYPE& Val )
00284 {
00285     // just call the add function
00286     return Add(Val);
00287 }

00295 // Set position to the first element
00296 template <typename TYPE>
00297 void SimpleList<TYPE>::First()
00298 {
00299     PreviousElement = NULL;
00300     CurrentElement = Head;
00301     RemoveCurrentHasOccured = false;
00302 }
00303
00304 // Set position to the next element
00305 template <typename TYPE>
00306 bool SimpleList<TYPE>::Next()
00307 {
00308     // Ok, we do not have any other element
00309     if ( CurrentElement == NULL ){
00310         RemoveCurrentHasOccured = false;
00311         return false;
00312     }
00313
00314     //seb
00315     if(RemoveCurrentHasOccured){
00316         RemoveCurrentHasOccured = false;
00317         // Previous and Current have already the good value
00318         return true;
00319     }
00320
00321     // Here we can go forward in the list
00322     PreviousElement = CurrentElement;
00323     CurrentElement  = CurrentElement->NextElement;
00324
00325     // Have we reach the end of the list ?
00326     if ( CurrentElement == NULL )
00327     {
00328         return false;
00329     }
00330
00331     return true;
00332 }
00333
00334 // Set position to the next element
00335 template <typename TYPE>
00336 bool SimpleList<TYPE>::AtEnd() const
00337 {
00338     // Ok, we do not have any other element
00339     if ( CurrentElement == NULL )
00340         return true;
00341
00342     return false;
00343 }
00344
00345 // Set position to the next element
00346 template <typename TYPE>
00347 bool SimpleList<TYPE>::NotAtEnd() const
00348 {
00349     // Ok, we do not have any other element
00350     if ( CurrentElement != NULL )
00351         return true;
00352
00353     return false;
00354 }
00355
00356 // Get the current element of the list
00357 template <typename TYPE>
00358 TYPE& SimpleList<TYPE>::GetCurrent() const
00359 {
00360     if(RemoveCurrentHasOccured)
00361         throw SimpleListException("SimpleList<TYPE>::GetCurrent : Forbidden after a call to RemoveCurrent");
00362
00363 #ifdef DEBUG
00364     if ( CurrentElement== NULL )
00365     {
00366         OmiscidError( "Warning :  In SimpleList<TYPE>::GetCurrent() CurrentElement == NULL\n" );
00367     }
00368 #endif
00369 
00370     return CurrentElement->ElementContainer;
00371 }
00372
00373 // Remove the current element
00374 template <typename TYPE>
00375 bool SimpleList<TYPE>::RemoveCurrent()
00376 {
00377     if(RemoveCurrentHasOccured)
00378         throw SimpleListException("SimpleList<TYPE>::RemoveCurrent : Forbidden after a previous call to RemoveCurrent");
00379     RemoveCurrentHasOccured = true;
00380     SimpleListElement<TYPE> * tmp = CurrentElement;
00381
00382     if ( tmp == NULL )
00383     {
00384         // We must call at least First on a non empty list
00385         return false;
00386     }
00387
00388     // Here we have a current element...
00389     // Are we at the begining of the SimpleList ?
00390     if ( Head == tmp )
00391     {
00392         // Yes, wa are !
00393         Head = tmp->NextElement;
00394
00395         // PreviousElement remains the same :
00396         // PreviousElement == NULL
00397
00398         // The new current element if the next in the list, so the head
00399         CurrentElement = Head;
00400     }
00401     else
00402     {
00403         // We are not at the begining of the list
00404         // Here we can remove directly the element within the list
00405         tmp = CurrentElement;
00406         PreviousElement->NextElement = tmp->NextElement;
00407         CurrentElement = tmp->NextElement;
00408     }
00409
00410     // Was the element the last item of the list ?
00411     if ( Tail == tmp )
00412     {
00413         // We have remove the last item of the list
00414         Tail = PreviousElement;
00415     }
00416
00417     // Delete the old current element
00418      ReleaseSimpleListElement(tmp);
00419
00420     // Change the element count
00421     NumberOfElements--;
00422
00423     return true;
00424 }
00425
00426 // Remove a specific element
00427 template <typename TYPE>
00428 bool SimpleList<TYPE>::Remove(const TYPE& Element)
00429 {
00430     for( First(); NotAtEnd(); Next() )
00431     {
00432         if ( GetCurrent() == Element )
00433         {
00434             RemoveCurrent();
00435             return true;
00436         }
00437     }
00438     return false;
00439 }
00440
00441 template <typename TYPE>
00442 void SimpleList<TYPE>::Empty()
00443 {
00444     SimpleListElement<TYPE> * tmp;
00445     // On libere tous les elements de la liste
00446     while( Head != NULL )
00447     {
00448         tmp = Head;
00449         Head = Head->NextElement; // On dechaine le premier element
00450         ReleaseSimpleListElement(tmp);
00451         NumberOfElements--; // Non obligatoire !
00452     }
00453 }
00454
00455 template <typename TYPE>
00456 bool SimpleList<TYPE>::IsEmpty() const
00457 { return Head == NULL; }
00458
00459 template <typename TYPE>
00460 bool SimpleList<TYPE>::IsNotEmpty() const
00461 { return Head != NULL; }
00462
00463 template <typename TYPE>
00464 TYPE SimpleList<TYPE>::ExtractFirst()
00465 {
00466   if(IsEmpty())
00467     throw SimpleListException("SimpleList<TYPE>::ExtractFirst : Forbidden when the list is empty");
00468
00469   SimpleListElement<TYPE>* elt = Head;
00470   if(Head == Tail)
00471     {
00472       Head = NULL; Tail = NULL;
00473     }else{
00474       Head = elt->NextElement;
00475     }
00476   NumberOfElements--;
00477
00478   TYPE tmp = elt->ElementContainer;
00479   ReleaseSimpleListElement(elt);
00480   return tmp;
00481 }

00483 template <typename TYPE>
00484 SimpleListElement<TYPE>*  SimpleList<TYPE>::GetNewSimpleListElement() const
00485 {
00486     return new OMISCID_TLM SimpleListElement<TYPE>;
00487 }
00488
00489 template <typename TYPE>
00490 void SimpleList<TYPE>::ReleaseSimpleListElement(SimpleListElement<TYPE>* elt) const
00491 {
00492     delete elt;
00493 }

00504 template <typename TYPE>
00505 class MutexedSimpleList : public SimpleList<TYPE>
00506 {
00507 public:
00508 #ifdef DEBUG
00509     MutexedSimpleList()
00510     {
00511         NbLocks = 0; // MutexedSimpleList is not lock
00512     }
00513
00514     virtual ~MutexedSimpleList()
00515     {
00516         NbLocks = 100; // MutexedSimpleList is not lock anymore,
00517         // All operation will be permitted to destroy the list
00518     }
00519
00520     bool Add( const TYPE& Val )
00521     {
00522         if ( NbLocks == 0 )
00523         {
00524             fprintf( stderr, "Using Add on a non lock list.\n" );
00525         }
00526         return SimpleList<TYPE>::Add(Val);
00527     }
00528
00529     bool AddHead( const TYPE& Val )
00530     {
00531         if ( NbLocks == 0 )
00532         {
00533             fprintf( stderr, "Using AddHeah on a non lock list.\n" );
00534         }
00535         return SimpleList<TYPE>::AddHead(Val);
00536     }
00537
00538     bool AddTail( const TYPE& Val )
00539     {
00540         if ( NbLocks == 0 )
00541         {
00542             fprintf( stderr, "Using AddTail on a non lock list.\n" );
00543         }
00544         return SimpleList<TYPE>::AddTail(Val);
00545     }
00546
00547     unsigned int GetNumberOfElements() const
00548     {
00549         if ( NbLocks == 0 )
00550         {
00551             fprintf( stderr, "Using GetNumberOfElements on a non lock list.\n" );
00552         }
00553         return SimpleList<TYPE>::GetNumberOfElements();
00554     }
00555
00556     void First()
00557     {
00558         if ( NbLocks == 0 )
00559         {
00560             fprintf( stderr, "Using First on a non lock list.\n" );
00561         }
00562         SimpleList<TYPE>::First();
00563     }
00564
00565     bool Next()
00566     {
00567         if ( NbLocks == 0 )
00568         {
00569             fprintf( stderr, "Using Next on a non lock list.\n" );
00570         }
00571         return SimpleList<TYPE>::Next();
00572     }
00573
00574     bool AtEnd() const
00575     {
00576         if ( NbLocks == 0 )
00577         {
00578             fprintf( stderr, "Using AtEnd on a non lock list.\n" );
00579         }

00682
00683 template <typename TYPE>
00684 bool MutexedSimpleList<TYPE>::Lock()
00685 {
00686 #ifdef DEBUG
00687     // Only for MutexedSimpleList debugging
00688     bool ret = mutex.EnterMutex();
00689
00690     if ( ret == true )
00691     {
00692         NbLocks++;
00693     }
00694     return ret;
00695 #else
00696     return mutex.EnterMutex();
00697 #endif
00698 }
00699
00700 template <typename TYPE>
00701 bool MutexedSimpleList<TYPE>::Unlock()
00702 {
00703 #ifdef DEBUG
00704     if ( NbLocks == 0 )
00705     {
00706         OmiscidTrace( "List already unlock. something goes wrong ?" );
00707     }
00708
00709     // Only for MutexedSimpleList debugging
00710     bool ret = mutex.LeaveMutex();
00711
00712     if ( ret == true && NbLocks > 0)
00713     {
00714         NbLocks++;
00715     }
00716     return ret;
00717 #else
00718     return mutex.LeaveMutex();
00719 #endif
00720 }
